multiple_choice.question: What did Elephant have with him?
Who did they see in the river?
What did hare tie between Elephant and Buffalo?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: Hare started eating Elephant's honey straight away
Hare ran and hid himself in a tree
Hare went to Buffalo and praised her, saying that she was stronger

meanings.wound: an injury to skin caused by a cut
meanings.waist: the part of the human body below the ribs and above the hips
meanings.neither: not the one nor the other of two people or things
meanings.drip: let fall or be so wet as to shed small drops of liquid
